page.title: 10MULLION PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: We spoke to Mr.Buchanan, the Clerk to Mullion Parish Council, about his work in the village. He is paid part-time to organise parish council meetings, and has other duties as well. He has responsibility for street lighting, for the cemetery and for building in the village. At the moment there are only 4 places left for burial in the local cemetery, so that the field will have to be extended and the new ground consecrated. There are now more cremations than burials which has eased the problem, since the plot required for a cremation is smaller than that for a burial. Six new factory units are to be built in the village (In 1983,49 votes for,23 against).Everyone wants to ease the high unemployment in the area, but the position of the units near the school and shopping centre might be dangerous
